output_list.criticism: The mintToken function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The mintToken function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to zero.
The buy function always uses the buyPrice set in the contract, but never checks if the user has enough balance.
The sell function uses the sellPrice set in the contract, but never checks if the user has earned enough before selling.
The burn function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of the user to zero.
The burnFrom function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of the user to zero, while also allowing the user to burn a token of any value.
